en: I spent some time beating that up.
I won't go near him again

es: Nada anormal, sabor feo, incomodidad, y esas cosas,nothing abnormal
Hace lo que te diga y todo irá bien
en: Do what I tell you and everything will be fine

es: Elizabeth, yo que tu no le haria caso
en: Elizabeth, if I were you, I wouldn't pay attention to him.

es: ya te dijimos que no sigues ahí
en: We already told you that you are not still there

es: no saques nada de tu bolsillo y ven conmigo
en: don't take anything out of your pocket and come with me
You, daughter of a thousand bitches

es: Tantos idiomas y solo respondes con putazos
en: So many languages and you only respond with death

es: toma esto y ve a jugar por ahí
en: take this and go play around

es: y tan bien que estabas yendo
en: and you were doing so well

es: *Te jala la cabeza y sientes algo feo*
en: *He pulls your head and you feel something ugly*

es: Nomas para eso sirves, pedazo de basura
en: That's what you're good for, you piece of trash
